data: {"concept_id": "character_truth", "concept_name": "Character Truth", "type": "element", "definition": "The core emotional reality beneath persona—fears, beliefs, longings—that steers reactions and choices even when unspoken.", "scope_notes": "Revealed by contradiction between persona and private truth; can be conscious or unconscious; dials Low→Medium→High strength; evolves under pressure.", "axes": "mode|strength", "axis_values": "confess|enact|leak|conflict_test|reflection | low|medium|high", "secondary_axes": "awareness|persona_gap", "secondary_axis_values": "conscious|unconscious | narrow|wide", "pairs_well_with": "identity|motivation|drive|decision_style|backstory|body_logic|voice", "conflicts_with": "tell_only|overdramatize|fixed_label|plot_puppetry|resetting", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_truth_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_truth_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "signal_id": "sig_confess", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "confess", "description": "Truth is named out loud (confession, admission, vow).", "detection_hint": "Explicit lines tied to cost or change.", "false_positive_risks": "Speech with zero consequence.", "minimal_example": "“I can’t be left again.” She cancels the trip and calls her sister.", "counterexample": "Five-paragraph monologue no scene remembers.", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "signal_id": "sig_enact", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "enact", "description": "Behavior proves the truth without naming it.", "detection_hint": "Repeated choices and sacrifices under pressure.", "false_positive_risks": "One-off stunt unrelated to pattern.", "minimal_example": "He gives up the seat, then the job offer, to stay near home.", "counterexample": "Random generous act, never repeated.", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "signal_id": "sig_leak", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "leak", "description": "Truth leaks via slips and contradictions (jokes, deflection, micro-gestures).", "detection_hint": "Evasions, overreactions, body tells; objects kept/avoided.", "false_positive_risks": "Vague vibes with nothing to infer.", "minimal_example": "She laughs off fear, but the packed go-bag never leaves the door.", "counterexample": "Mysterious aura with no cues.", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "signal_id": "sig_conflict_test", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "conflict_test", "description": "Clash forces the truth to surface against persona.", "detection_hint": "Public stakes; choices contradict the stated image.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle that resets next scene.", "minimal_example": "‘I’m fine’—then she calls the one person she swore off when it matters.", "counterexample": "Big blowup with no aftermath.", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "signal_id": "sig_reflection", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "reflection", "description": "Private thought/symbol anchors the truth in image or ritual.", "detection_hint": "Recurring inner line, prayer, or object routine tied to choices.", "false_positive_risks": "Purple introspection with no action link.", "minimal_example": "He folds the letter three times before every risky call.", "counterexample": "Moody mirror scene that changes nothing.", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "signal_id": "sig_awareness_conscious", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "awareness:conscious", "description": "Character knows and can name the truth; acts for/against it intentionally.", "detection_hint": "Direct self-knowledge; therapy/journal scenes with consequences.", "false_positive_risks": "Labels with no proof or change.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "signal_id": "sig_awareness_unconscious", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "awareness:unconscious", "description": "Truth drives behavior outside awareness; patterns noticed by others.", "detection_hint": "Repetition the character can’t explain; third-party mirrors it.", "false_positive_risks": "Random inconsistency framed as mystery.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "signal_id": "sig_gap_narrow", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "persona_gap:narrow", "description": "Persona ≈ truth; minimal dissonance; low subtext load.", "detection_hint": "Honesty or integration under low stakes.", "false_positive_risks": "Boring sameness with no tension.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "signal_id": "sig_gap_wide", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "persona_gap:wide", "description": "Persona conflicts with truth; strong subtext and reversal risk.", "detection_hint": "Public mask vs private need; high-cost reveals.", "false_positive_risks": "Whiplash with no setup or cost.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "signal_id": "sig_strength_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Vague hints; reversible micro-steps; minimal vulnerability.", "detection_hint": "General restlessness; light contradictions; small private tells.", "false_positive_risks": "Atmosphere with zero link to choice.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "signal_id": "sig_strength_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "Clear influence on motives and relationships; visible tension.", "detection_hint": "Behavior/cost patterns; honest moments under pressure.", "false_positive_risks": "Activity without consequences.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "signal_id": "sig_strength_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "Dominant, identity-shaping truth; public, costly, irreversible beats.", "detection_hint": "Climax hinges on confronting/embracing truth; no reset.", "false_positive_risks": "Shock-only reveal followed by status quo.", "minimal_example": "", "counterexample": "", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "misconception_id": "tell_only", "description": "Thinking truth must be stated outright; no behavioral proof.", "tells": "Speeches stand in for pattern/cost.", "likely_causes": "Confusing clarity with craft.", "corrective_feedback": "Replace speech with 2 actions + 1 consequence.", "micro_drill": "Cut monologue; add patterned choice + fallout.", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "misconception_id": "overdramatize", "description": "Assuming truth must be extreme trauma; ignoring quieter cores.", "tells": "Only big traumas used.", "likely_causes": "Scale confusion.", "corrective_feedback": "Use specific, everyday contradictions with stakes.", "micro_drill": "Write a quiet reveal that changes a choice.", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "misconception_id": "fixed_label", "description": "Treating truth as static and never evolving.", "tells": "No shifts despite events.", "likely_causes": "Fear of breaking plan.", "corrective_feedback": "Use strength dials and secondary axes over time.", "micro_drill": "Map Low→Med→High or reveal→integration.", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "misconception_id": "plot_puppetry", "description": "Truth bends to serve twists rather than character reality.", "tells": "Whiplash contradictions with no seeds.", "likely_causes": "Outline-first forcing.", "corrective_feedback": "Seed leaks and contradictions; pay costs.", "micro_drill": "Add an early leak + public consequence.", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"concept_id": "character_truth", "misconception_id": "resetting", "description": "Reveals/mechanics reset; no carry-through.", "tells": "Aftermath vanishes.", "likely_causes": "Avoiding complexity.", "corrective_feedback": "Carry one cost across three scenes.", "micro_drill": "List 3 echoes; keep one alive.", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_truth_identify_mode_strength", "concept_id": "character_truth", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label each passage by revelation mode (confess/enact/leak/conflict_test/reflection) and strength (low/med/high). Justify with one concrete cue.", "expected_features": "Correct mode+strength; cites evidence; notes cost/publicness/consistency.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels + sharp evidence + consequence note", "Meets": "Mostly accurate with basic evidence", "Developing": "Labels or evidence off"}, "distractor_strategy": "Speeches with no aftermath and vague-vibe leaks as traps.", "hint_steps": "1) Spot cue 2) Choose mode 3) Gauge strength by cost/publicness/pattern", "variation_axes": "mode|strength", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_truth_triangulate_persona", "concept_id": "character_truth", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "When persona and behavior disagree, decide the truer truth and explain why.", "expected_features": "Weights behavior/patterns over claims; cites cost.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Inference grounded in persistent behavior and cost", "Meets": "Reasonable inference", "Developing": "Vibes-only"}, "distractor_strategy": "Boasts as distractors.", "hint_steps": "1) Collect persona claims 2) Collect behaviors 3) Name the truer core", "variation_axes": "persona|behavior", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_truth_escalate", "concept_id": "character_truth", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Escalate a reveal from Low→Med→High without melodrama by changing stakes, publicness, irreversibility, and contradiction pressure.", "expected_features": "Edits shift reversibility and audience; no adjective inflation.", "scoring_method": "count_features|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Clear ladder with sticky changes", "Meets": "Some escalation", "Developing": "Wordier, same stakes"}, "distractor_strategy": "Adjective-only edits.", "hint_steps": "1) Raise cost 2) Widen audience 3) Remove escape", "variation_axes": "stakes|publicness|irreversibility", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_truth_seed_and_payoff", "concept_id": "character_truth", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "order", "prompt_template": "Seed two early leaks and pay them off with a public conflict-test that either integrates or fractures the truth.", "expected_features": "Seeds visible; payoff credible; consequence persists.", "scoring_method": "pattern", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Seeds echo in payoff with sticky cost", "Meets": "Payoff present; partial echo", "Developing": "Payoff feels unearned"}, "distractor_strategy": "Coincidental payoff traps.", "hint_steps": "1) Choose two leaks 2) Design conflict-test 3) Land cost", "variation_axes": "foreshadow|payoff", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_truth_hide_to_legible", "concept_id": "character_truth", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "A scene hides the truth too well. Add legible leaks (gesture/object/slip) that hint at the core without naming it.", "expected_features": "Subtext becomes readable; still subtle.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Cues clear yet subtextual", "Meets": "Some legibility", "Developing": "Still opaque"}, "distractor_strategy": "Random red herrings.", "hint_steps": "1) Pick a tell 2) Tie to object/gesture 3) Add tiny consequence", "variation_axes": "subtext|leak", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_truth_1", "concept_id": "character_truth", "axis_value": "leak|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "He jokes about winning, but the trophies are boxed under the bed, polished.", "context_tags": "persona_gap|insecurity", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_truth_2", "concept_id": "character_truth", "axis_value": "confess|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "“I am not brave,” she says, and turns the car around anyway.", "context_tags": "confession|enact", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_truth_3", "concept_id": "character_truth", "axis_value": "conflict_test|high", "label": "strong", "text": "He signs the report that names his boss and hands it over on camera.", "context_tags": "public|irreversible", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_truth_4", "concept_id": "character_truth", "axis_value": "reflection|low", "label": "strong", "text": "She traces the crease of the old letter before every risky call.", "context_tags": "ritual|fear", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_truth_weak_1", "concept_id": "character_truth", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "A moody paragraph about ‘who he really is,’ followed by no change.", "context_tags": "tell_only", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_truth_weak_2", "concept_id": "character_truth", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Shocking reveal that everyone forgets next chapter.", "context_tags": "resetting", "source_file": "Character Truth.md", "source_md5": "b3f5941489ec44ba5f31be33944fdc8f", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:52:04.690057Z"}
